title: Strictly fans call for Len Goodman to RETURN as they blast judges over Catherine Tyldesley exit
text:
Sunday night's Strictly Come Dancing results show saw Catherine Tyldesly become the fifth contestant to leave the competition following a dance-off against Mike Bushell.

The decision to send home the Coronation Street star, 36, and her ballroom partner Johannes Radebe, 32, left viewers at home raging with the judges, with many calling for former head judge Len Goodman to return.

Meanwhile, there wasn't a dry eye in the house following the pair's emotional exit, with Johannes' heartfelt speech moving fans to tears.

Out: Strictly Come Dancing fans have called for Len Goodman to RETURN as they furiously blast judges over Catherine Tyldesley elimination

During the show, Catherine and Johannes were made to perform their Cha Cha once again at the end of the show's Halloween Week, after hovering near the bottom of the leaderboard with a score of 24 out of a possible 40.

While Mike, 53, and his partner Katya Jones, 30, who were third from bottom on the leaderboard after scoring just 26, once again performed the Tango to Gwen Stefani's hit What You Waiting For.

Following their dances for survival, the judges gave their verdicts, with Craig Revel Horwood choosing to save Mike and Katya, as he explained: 'One couple for me really stepped it up a notch. The couple I’d like to save is Mike and Katya.'

Motsi Mabuse chose to save Catherine and Johannes, saying: 'I felt a strong performance, stronger body actions, stronger leg actions.'

Comeback? The decision to send home the Coronation Street star, 36, and her ballroom partner Johannes Radebe, 32, left fans wanting to see Len make a comeback

Next up was Bruno Tonioili, who said: 'It’s hard because you’ve both done very, very well, but purely based on tonight I have to save the couple that got me tingling a little bit more and I have to save Catherine and Johannes.'

Left with the deciding vote, head judge Shirley opined: 'Well, I thought both couples really stepped it up a notch and this is always the most difficult decision for me.

'But based on a good focus, difficult content, with some really beautiful footwork in there with stronger technical skills for me, cleaner and polished. I’m going to save Mike and Katya.'

However, viewers were left seething at the judges' decision, with many feeling that Catherine was the better dancer between the two.

Backlash: Viewers were left seething at the judges' decision, with many feeling that Catherine was the better dancer between the two

Not impressed: So much was their anger that several viewers declared that the show should 'bring back Len', with the former judge having quit the show in 2016

So much was their anger that several viewers declared that the show should 'bring back Len', with the former judge having quit the show in 2016.

Taking to Twitter, one viewer declared: 'The judges on strictly need replacing ASAP. Bring back Len. Shambles of a show. #Strictly.'

While another fumed: '#Strictly shame on you judges..... no way should Kathryn & Johannes be voted off today. An avid follower from series one ... no more !'

'Whaaaaaat are you playing at #Strictly ?!?!?! Absolutely DEVASTATED for @jojo_radebe and @Cath_Tyldesley,' ranted a third watcher.

Divided: However, some viewers agreed with the judges decision and said that Catherine was right to be sent home over Mike

'Why can’t they go to deadlock when the votes are tied and let the public have the casting vote instead of Shirley who lets face it sends home the person she just doesn’t like! Bring back Len and his pickled walnuts or this show is doomed!' said a fourth.

With a fifth angry viewer adding: 'Come back Len Goodman! The scoring has been all over the place this series. Totally inconsistent. Watch for them over scoring Mike again next week to justify keeping him in this week #Strictly.'

However, some viewers agreed with the judges decision and said that Catherine was right to be sent home over Mike.

Last dance: Catherine and her ballroom partner Johannes became the fifth couple to be voted off Strictly Come Dancing on Sunday. [Pictured with host Tess Daly]

'So this might be controversial but I have to agree with @ShirleyBallas & @CraigRevHorwood tonight. Having danced for nearly 30 yrs, based on the dance off alone @mikebreakfast was the better dancer. That said, I blinking loved @Cath_Tyldesley& am very sad to see her go #Strictly' wrote one viewer.

While another added: 'I love Katherine but I agree that she should be out. In the dance off judges are supposed to judge based on footwork and such and she stumbled quite clearly. She is a much better dancer but unfortunately she took a misstep. #strictly.'

Meanwhile, there wasn't a dry eye in the house as Johannes made an emotional farewell speech following his first series with a celebrity dance partner.

So sad: Meanwhile, there wasn't a dry eye in the house as Johannes made an emotional farewell speech following his first series with a celebrity dance partner

Choking back tears, Johannes said: 'The beautiful thing is that I need to thank Strictly Come Dancing for the opportunity…

'Most of all, I want to say thank you to this woman. She has been a light for me. Thank you for accepting me for who I am and for showing me joy every day.'

Fans were left moved by his words, with one sobbing: 'I’m not crying at Johannes farewell... you are #Strictly #Strictlyresults.'

While another wrote: 'Catherine and Johannes noooooooooo!! Love them!! I’m crying! #Strictly.'

'Johannes crying! I can't cope!' moaned a third upset watcher.

With another adding: 'when Johannes said “thank you for accepting who i am”, i really felt that, genuinely ok the verge of tears right now.'

Strictly Come Dancing returns Saturday at 7pm on BBC One.
description: Strictly fans called for Len Goodman to RETURN as they furiously blasted the bjudges over Catherine Tyldesley's elimination, while Johannes Radebe's exit speech left everyone in TEARS.
